description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 242994HH dated 16.10.2024 for 'Single storey rear extension; removal of chimney breast; roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roofslope; single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as office (following demolition of existing garage)'. Amendment seeks permission to clad the new loft dormer in slate effect tiles, rather than the zinc cladding
decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to reference 242994HH dated 16.10.2024 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
